title: 111_s2994
content: Taxpayer Fairness Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) impose a 50 tax on bonuses, including retention bonuses, exceeding $400,000 paid in 2009 to employees of financial institutions that received $5 billion or more in emergency economic assistance from the federal government. And (2) limit the business tax deduction for such bonuses to 50 of the amount of such bonuses.
